honors_and_awards.title: Client Award for Excellence
honors_and_awards.description: The award was given for undertaking complex modeling assignments around dealer profitability modeling and strategy formulation. While working on the newly launched Secured Auto lending strategy project, I took the onus of building the loss projection models for different auto dealers/brokers and then interlinking these to the profitability models for the dealers.
